title: Badge Class Endorsement
description: An outside endorsement of a badge and associated opportunities. The issuer may award this badge to many earners under this endorsement.

endorsement.description: Collection of properties describing this endorsement.

badgeClassURL.description: The URL of the badgeClass to be endorsed

endorserName.description: The name of the party or organization endorsing this badge.

endorserWebsite.description: URL of the website associated with the endorser.

endorserStatement.description: Statement from the endorser about their endorsement decision.

verify.description: Verification object containing the URL of the endorser's public key and a signature generated to match.

url.description: URL of the hosted public key on the endorser's domain.

signature.description: JSON Web Signature tying the endorsement object of this badgeClass extension to the endorser via the endorser's key.
